code: import React from"react";import"./RouteList.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RouteList=_ref=>{let{stops}=_ref;if(!stops||stops.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"route-list-empty",children:"No stops to display"});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"route-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"route-list-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Optimized Route Sequence"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"route-info",children:["Total Stops: ",stops.length]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stops-container",children:stops.map((stop,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stop-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stop-marker",children:[index===0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"marker start",children:"\uD83D\uDEA9"}),index===stops.length-1&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"marker end",children:"\uD83C\uDFC1"}),index>0&&index<stops.length-1&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"marker number",children:index+1})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stop-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stop-name",children:stop["Boarding Point"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stop-time",children:["\u23F0 ",stop.Time]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stop-coords",children:["\uD83D\uDCCD ",stop.lat.toFixed(4),", ",stop.lon.toFixed(4)]}),stop.students!==undefined&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stop-students",children:["\uD83D\uDC65 Students: ",stop.students]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stop-position",children:["#",index+1]})]},index))})]});};export default RouteList;
